title: 9 lp???
body: Why did I get 9 lp this is stupid???

replies.body: Loss forgiven was enabled yesterday briefly.  Rules for that are that the losing team won't lose LP and winning team gains half.  I'm not 100% sure on the reasoning of that but part of it is to mitigate LP inflation.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Afic,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=E57pNRiU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-07T16:32:14.572+0000)
>
> Loss forgiven was enabled yesterday briefly.  Rules for that are that the losing team won't lose LP and winning team gains half.  I'm not 100% sure on the reasoning of that but part of it is to mitigate LP inflation.

So, was this just a small test done to gain some data on a new system implementation? It's very strange to have something like this happen without notifying players before hand, unless it's a secretive thing still in production.

Not entirely sure, but as far as I know loss forgiven tends to be enabled when there are some larger internet or similar related problems that are affecting many players.  

It is possible that some ISPs had issues which were causing many players to have severely degraded experiences for example.  Again, I don't actually have too much context, but that is the type of thing that can happen in this situation.

Don't remember specifically when, but it was a while ago (maybe ~3+ years?)
